to_course_page: function to_course_page(index) {\n      this.$router.push({ path: '/course/page/' + this.courses[index]['course_id'] + '/' });\n    },\n    handle_current_change: function handle_current_change(value) {\n      this.current_page = value;\n      this.courses = [];\n      var len = this.storage.length < value * this.page_size ? this.storage.length % this.page_size : this.page_size;\n\n      for (var i = 0; i < len; i++) {\n        this.courses.push(this.storage[(value - 1) * this.page_size + i]);\n      }\n    },\n    course_tree_clicked: function course_tree_clicked(data, node) {\n      // todo: use api to get the corresponding courses\n      if (typeof node.parent.label !== 'undefined') {\n        this.course_bread_message = node.parent.label + '->' + node.label;\n        this.load_courses = true;\n        var self = this;\n        if (node.parent.label === '开设院系') {\n          var college_name = node.label;\n          var college_id = -1;\n          for (var id in __WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_2__general_collegeMap__[\"a\" /* default */]) {\n            if (__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_2__general_collegeMap__[\"a\" /* default */][id] === : college_id };\n          var post_url = Object(__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__general_getUrl__[\"a\" /* default */])(this.$store.state.dev, '/course/college_course/');\n data['course_info_list'];\n              self.storage = [];\n              self.total = info_list.length;\n              for (var i = 0; i < info_list.length; i++) {\n                var college_id = info_list[i]['college_id'];\n                var college_info = __WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_2__general_collegeMap__[\"a\" /* default */].hasOwnProperty(college_id) ? __WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_2__general_collegeMap__[\"a\" /* default */][college_id] : college_id.toString();\n                var item = {\n                  'course_name': info_list[i]['name'],\n eslint-disable brace-style */\n/* eslint-disable camelcase */\n\n// 请不要删除和geturl相关的行，直接把data中的dev更改成false就可以。by xindetai 12/3\n\n// import json from 'json5'\n/* harmony default export */ __webpack_exports__[\"a\"] = ({\n  name: 'Header',\n  beforeCreate: function beforeCreate() {\n    var self = this;\n    var post_url = Object(__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__getUrl_js__[\"a\" /* default */])(this.$store.state.dev, '/sign/logged_in/');\n    __WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0_jquery___default.a.ajax({\n      ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\n      dataType: 'json',\n      url: post_url,\n      type: 'POST',\n      success: function success(data) {\n        self.username = data['username'];\n        if (self.username == null) {\n          self.is_login = false;\n          self.$store.state.is_login = false;\n          self.$store.state.user_name = '';\n        } else {\n          self.is_login = true;\n          self.$store.state.is_login = true;\n          self.$store.state.user_name = self.username;\n        }\n      },\n      error: function error() {\n        alert('加载导航栏连接服务器失败');\n      }\n    });\n    post_url = Object(__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__getUrl_js__[\"a\" /* default */])(this.$store.state.dev, '/sign/iprecord/');\n    __WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0_jquery___default.a.ajax({\n      ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\n      dataType: 'json',\n      url: post_url,\n      type: 'POST',\n      success: function success(data) {},\n      error: function error() {\n        alert('ip记录链接失败');\n      }\n    });\n  },\n  data: function data() {\n    var _this = this;\n\n    var username_check_empty = function username_check_empty(rule, value, callback) {\n      if (!value) {\n        callback(new Error('用户名不能为空'));\n      }\n      callback();\n      // setTimeout(() => {  }, 500)\n    };\n    var password_check_empty = function password_check_empty(rule, value, callback) {\n      if (!value) {\n        callback(new Error('密码不能为空'));\n      }\n      callback();\n      // setTimeout(() => { callback() }, 500)\n    };\n    var check_username = function check_username(rule, value, callback) {\n      if (!value) {\n        callback(new Error('用户名不能为空'));\n      }\n      setTimeout(function () {\n        value = value.toLowerCase();\n        var pattern = new RegExp(/^[a-z0-9_]{1,20}$/);\n        if (pattern.test(value)) {\n          callback();\n        } else {\n          callback(new Error('用户名格式错误'));\n        }\n      }, 500);\n    };\n    var check_nickname = function check_nickname(rule, value, callback) {\n      if (!value) {\n        callback(new Error('昵称不能为空'));\n      }\n      setTimeout(function () {\n        var l = value.length;\n        var rl = 0;\n        for (var i = 0; i < l; i++) {\n          if ((value.charCodeAt(i) & 0xff00) !== 0) {\n            rl++;\n          }\n          rl++;\n        }\n        if (rl >= 1 && rl <= 20) {\n          callback();\n        } else {\n          callback(new Error('昵称长度必须在20位及以下'));\n        }\n      }, 500);\n    };\n    var check_gender = function check_gender(rule, value, callback) {\n      if (!value) {\n        callback(new Error('性别不能为空'));\n      }\n      callback();\n    };\n    var check_password = function check_password(rule, value, callback) {\n      if (!value) {\n        callback(new Error('密码不能为空'));\n      }\n      setTimeout(function () {\n        var pattern = new RegExp(/^.{8,20}$/);\n        if (pattern.test(value)) {\n          callback();\n        } else {\n          callback(new Error('密码长度必须在8-20位'));\n        }\n      }, 500);\n    };\n    var check_confirmed_password = function check_confirmed_password(rule, value, callback) {\n      if (!value) {\n        callback(new Error('请再次输入密码'));\n      }\n      setTimeout(function () {\n        if (value === _this.register_form.password) {\n          callback();\n        } else {\n          callback(new Error('两次输入密码不一致'));\n        }\n      }, 500);\n    };\n    var check_email = function check_email(rule, value, callback) {\n      if (!value) {\n        callback(new Error('邮箱不能为空'));\n      }\n      setTimeout(function () {\n        var pattern = new RegExp(/^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+@buaa.edu.cn$/);\n        if (pattern.test(value)) {\n          callback();\n        } else {\n          callback(new Error('非法邮箱，邮箱必须是北航邮箱'));\n        }\n      }, 500);\n    };\n    return {\n      logo_name: 'BUAA-iCourse',\n      is_login: false,\n      login_form_visible: false,\n      register_form_visible: false,\n      form_label_width: '80px',\n      username: '',\n      dev: true,\n      login_form: {\n        username: '',\n        password: ''\n      },\n      register_form: {\n        username: '',\n        nickname: '',\n        gender: '',\n        password: '',\n        confirmed_password: '',\n        email: ''\n      },\n      gender_options: [{\n        value: '1',\n        label: '男'\n      }, {\n        value: '2',\n        label: '女'\n      }, {\n        value: '0',\n        label: '保密'\n      }],\n      login_rules: {\n        username: [{ validator: username_check_empty, trigger: 'blur' }],\n        password: [{ validator: password_check_empty, trigger: 'blur' }]\n      },\n      register_rules: {\n        username: [{ validator: check_username, trigger: 'blur' }],\n        nickname: [{ validator: check_nickname, trigger: 'blur' }],\n        gender: [{ validator: check_gender, trigger: 'blur' }],\n        password: [{ validator: check_password, trigger: 'blur' }],\n        confirmed_password: [{ validator: check_confirmed_password, trigger: 'blur' }],\n        email: [{ validator: check_email, trigger: 'blur' }]\n      }\n    };\n  },\n\n  methods: {\n    tongpao: function tongpao() {\n      var post_url = Object(__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__getUrl_js__[\"a\" /* default */])(this.$store.state.dev, '/login_tongpao/');\n });\n    },\n    handle_select: function handle_select(key, keyPath) {\n      if (key === 'index') {\n        this.$router.push({ path: '/index' });\n      } else if (key === 'course') {\n        this.$router.push({ path: '/course' });\n      }\n    },\n    login: function login() {\n      this.login_form_visible = true;\n    },\n    personal_space: function personal_space() {\n      this.$router.push({ path: '/user/home/' + this.username });\n    },\n    register: function register() {\n      this.register_form_visible = true;\n    },\n    logo_clicked: function logo_clicked() {\n      this.$router.push({ path: '/index' });\n    },\n    logout: function logout() {\n      var self = this;\n      __WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0_jquery___default.a.ajax({\n        ContentType:        case 0:\n              self.is_login = false;\n              self.username = null;\n              alert('登出成功');\n              self.$store.state.is_login = false;\n     },\n        error: function error() {\n          alert('登出连接服务器失败');\n        }\n      });\n    },\n    login_confirm_clicked: function login_confirm_clicked(form_name) {\n      var _this2 = */])(this.$store.state.dev, '/resource/download/most/');\n      var post_data = { number: len, college_id: value };\n      var _this = this;\n load_courses: false, // v-loading\n      courses: [],\n      storage: [],\n      course_bread_message: '查找课程',\n      dev: true,\n      course_class_dict: ['工程基础类', '数学与自然科学类', '语言类', '博雅类', '核心通识类', '体育类', '一般通识类', '核心专业类', '一般专业类']\n    }\n  },\n  methods: {\n    to_course_page (index) {\n      this.$router.push({ path: ('/course/page/' + this.courses[index]['course_id'] + '/') })\n    },\n    handle_current_change (value) {\n      this.current_page = value\n      this.courses = []\n      var len = this.storage.length < value*this.page_size ? this.storage.length % this.page_size : this.page_size\n\n      for (var i = 0; i < len; i++) {\n        this.courses.push(this.storage[(value-1)*this.page_size+i])\n      }\n    },\n    course_tree_clicked (data, node) {\n      // todo: use api to get the corresponding courses\n      if (typeof (node.parent.label) !== 'undefined') {\n        this.course_bread_message = node.parent.label + '->' + node.label\n        this.load_courses = true\n        var self = this\n        if (node.parent.label === '开设院系') {\n          var college_name = node.label\n          var college_id = -1\n          for (var id in college_map) {\n            if (college_map[id] === college_name) {\n              college_id = id\n              break\n            }\n          }\n          var temp1 = { 'college_id': (college_id === -1) ? node.label.substr(0, node.label.length-1) : college_id }\n          var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/course/college_course/')\n          $.ajax({\n            ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\n            dataType: 'json',\n            type: 'POST',\n            url: post_url,\n            data: temp1,\n            async: false,\n            success: function (data) {\n              // 初始化storage和courses以及当前页数\n              var info_list = data['course_info_list']\n              self.storage = []\n              self.total = info_list.length\n              for (var i = 0; i < info_list.length; i++) {\n                var college_id = info_list[i]['college_id']\n                var college_info = (college_map.hasOwnProperty(college_id)) ? college_map[college_id] : college_id.toString()\n                var item = {\n                  'course_name': info_list[i]['name'],\n                  'course_id': info_list[i]['id'],\n                  'course_academy': college_info,\n                  'course_hours': info_list[i]['hours'],\n                  'course_credit': info_list[i]['credit'],\n                  'course_class': self.course_class_dict[info_list[i]['class_id'] - 1]\n                }\n                self.storage.push(item)\n              }\n            },\n            error: function () {\n              alert('拉取信息失败!')\n            }\n          })\n          self.handle_current_change(1)\n          self.load_courses = false\n        }\n        else if (node.parent.label === '课程类别') {\n case ('核心专业课'):\n              temp2.class_id = '2'\n              break\n            case ('一般专业课'):\n              temp2.class_id = '3'\n              break\n            case ('公共必修课'):\n      data: temp2,\n            success: function (data) {\n              console.log('ok')\n            },\n            error: function () {\n              alert('错误')\n            }\n          })\n this.get_liked_courses()\n        }\n      }\n    },\n    search_course_clicked () {\n      if (!this.filters.name) {\n        this.$message.error({\n          showClose: true,\n          message: '搜索内容不能为空!'\n        })\n      }\n      else {\n        this.load_courses = true\n        this.course_bread_message = this.filters.name\n        var post_data = {\n          'keyword': this.filters.name\n        }\n        var self = this\n        var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/course/searching/')\n        $.ajax({\n          ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\n          dataType: 'json',\n          url: post_url,\n          type: 'POST',\n          data: post_data,\n          async: false,\n          success: function (data) {\n            self.total = data['query_list'].length\n            self.storage = []\n            for (var i = 0; i < data['query_list'].length; i++) {\n              var course = data['query_list'][i]\n              var college_id = course['college_id']\n              var college_info = (college_map.hasOwnProperty(college_id)) ? college_map[college_id] : college_id.toString()\n              self.storage.push({\n                'course_name': course['name'],\n                'course_id': course['id'],\n                'course_academy': college_info,\n                'course_hours': course['hours'],\n                'course_credit': course['credit'],\n                'course_class': course['class_id']\n              })\n            }\n          },\n          error: function () {\n            alert('连接服务器异常')\n          }\n        })\n        self.handle_current_change(1)\n        self.load_courses = false\n      }\n    },\n    get_liked_courses () {\n      this.load_courses = true\n      this.course_bread_message = '我的收藏'\n      var self = this\n      var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/course/like/list/')\n      $.ajax({\n        ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\n        dataType: 'json',\n        type: 'POST',\n        url: post_url,\n        async: false,\n        success: function (data) {\n          // 初始化storage和courses以及当前页数\n          var info_list = data['info_list']\n          self.storage = []\n          self.total = info_list.length\n          for (var i = 0; i < info_list.length; i++) {\n            var college_id = info_list[i]['college_id']\n            var college_info = (college_map.hasOwnProperty(college_id)) ? college_map[college_id] : college_id.toString()\n            var item = {\n              'course_name': info_list[i]['name'],\n              'course_id': info_list[i]['id'],\n              'course_academy': college_info,\n              'course_hours': info_list[i]['hours'],\n              'course_credit': info_list[i]['credit'],\n              'course_class': self.course_class_dict[info_list[i]['class_id'] - 1]\n            }\n            self.storage.push(item)\n          }\n        },\n        error: function () {\n          alert('拉取信息失败!')\n        }\n      })\n      self.handle_current_change(1)\n      self.load_courses = false\n    },\n    add_course_clicked () {\n      // todo: add course function\n      this.$message({\n        showClose: true,\n        message: '功能暂未开放，敬请期待'\n      })\n    }\n  },\n  mounted () {\n    this.get_liked_courses()\n  }\n}\n</script>\n\n<style type=\"text/css\" scpoed>\n    .tools_bar_above {\n      width: auto;\n      float: left;\n    }\n    .tools_bar_bottom {\n      margin-top: 10px;\n    }\n    .navigator {\n        font-family: Microsoft Yahei;\n        display: flex;\n        top: 60px;\n        bottom: 0px;\n        oveflow:hidden;\n      }\n      .course_tree {\n        height: auto;\n        width: color: #475669;\n            margin-top: 10px;\n            margin-bottom: 10px;\n          }\n      .content-wrapper {\n          background-color: #fff;\n          box-sizing: border-box;\n        }\n      .course_content_container{\n      }\n</style>\n\n\n// WEBPACK FOOTER //\n// src/components/course/Course.vue","function injectStyle (ssrContext) {\n  require(\"!!../../../node_modules/extract-text-webpack-plugin/dist/loader.js?{\\\"omit\\\":1,\\\"remove\\\":true}!vue-style-loader!css-loader?{\\\"minimize\\\":true,\\\"sourceMap\\\":true}!../../../node_modules/vue-loader/lib/style-compiler/index?{\\\"vue\\\":true,\\\"id\\\":\\\"data-v-b7baf8d2\\\",\\\"scoped\\\":false,\\\"hasInlineConfig\\\":false}!../../../node_modules/vue-loader/lib/selector?type=styles&index=0!./Thread.vue\")\n}\nvar \"!!../../../node_modules/vue-loader/lib/template-compiler/index?{\\\"id\\\":\\\"data-v-b7baf8d2\\\",\\\"hasScoped\\\":false,\\\"transformToRequire\\\":{\\\"video\\\":\\\"src\\\",\\\"source\\\":\\\"src\\\",\\\"img\\\":\\\"src\\\",\\\"image\\\":\\\"xlink:href\\\"},\\\"buble\\\":{\\\"transforms\\\":{}}}!../../../node_modules/vue-loader/lib/selector?type=template&index=0!./Thread.vue\"\n/* __vue_module_identifier__ = null\nvar Component = normalizeComponent(\n  __vue_script__,\n  __vue_template__,\n  __vue_template_functional__,\n  __vue_styles__,\n  __vue_scopeId__,\n require(\"!!../../../node_modules/extract-text-webpack-plugin/dist/loader.js?{\\\"omit\\\":1,\\\"remove\\\":true}!vue-style-loader!css-loader?{\\\"minimize\\\":true,\\\"sourceMap\\\":true}!../../../node_modules/vue-loader/lib/style-compiler/index?{\\\"vue\\\":true,\\\"id\\\":\\\"data-v-b87dca86\\\",\\\"scoped\\\":true,\\\"hasInlineConfig\\\":false}!../../../node_modules/vue-loader/lib/selector?type=styles&index=0!./Course_info.vue\")\n}\nvar normalizeComponent = require(\"!../../../node_modules/vue-loader/lib/component-normalizer\")\n/* script */\nimport __vue_script__ from \"!!babel-loader!../../../node_modules/vue-loader/lib/selector?type=script&index=0!./Course_info.vue\"\n/* template */\nimport __vue_template__ from \"!!../../../node_modules/vue-loader/lib/template-compiler/index?{\\\"id\\\":\\\"data-v-b87dca86\\\",\\\"hasScoped\\\":true,\\\"transformToRequire\\\":{\\\"video\\\":\\\"src\\\",\\\"source\\\":\\\"src\\\",\\\"img\\\":\\\"src\\\",\\\"image\\\":\\\"xlink:href\\\"},\\\"buble\\\":{\\\"transforms\\\":{}}}!../../../node_modules/vue-loader/lib/selector?type=template&index=0!./Course_info.vue\"\n/* template functional */\n  var __vue_template_functional__ = false\n/* styles */\nvar __vue_styles__ = injectStyle\n/* scopeId */\nvar __vue_scopeId__ = \"data-v-b87dca86\"\n/* moduleIdentifier (server only) */\nvar __vue_module_identifier__ = null\nvar Component = normalizeComponent(\n  __vue_script__,\n  __vue_template__,\n  __vue_template_functional__,\n  __vue_styles__,\n  __vue_scopeId__,\n  __vue_module_identifier__\n)\n\nexport default Component.exports\n\n\n\n//////////////////\n// WEBPACK FOOTER\n// ./src/components/course/Course_info.vue\n// module id = 8YAD\n// module chunks = 1","<template>\n  <div id=\"resource\">\n    <el-row>\n      <el-col :span=\"24\">\n        <Header></Header>\n      </el-col>\n    </el-row>\n    <el-row style=\"margin:80px 0px 0px 0px;\">\n class=\"el-icon-d-arrow-left\"></i>返回课程页面</el-button>\n        </el-col>\n        <el-col id=\"resourceTitle\" :span=\"15\">\n          {{ course }}-课程资源\n        </el-col>\n      </el-row>\n    </el-button-group>\n        </el-col>\n      </el-row>\n      <el-row style=\"margin:20px 0px 0px 0px;\">\n        <el-col :span=\"4\" :offset=\"2\">\n          <el-select v-model=\"sortMode\"   </el-col>        \n        <el-col :span=\"2\" :offset=\"1\">\n          <el-button type=\"button\" @click.native=\"closed\">搜索资源</el-button>\n        </el-col>\n        <el-col :span=\"2\">\n          <el-button type=\"button\" @click.native=\"uploadDialogVisible=true\">上传资源</el-button>\n        </el-col>\n      </el-row>\n      <el-row>\n        <el-col :span=\"20\" :offset=\"2\">\n :span=\"14\" :offset=\"1\">\n              <el-row class=\"resourceTitle\">\n                <p>{{ item.name }}</p>\n              </el-row>\n              <el-row class=\"resourceIntro\">\n                <span>{{ item.intro }}</span>\n              </el-row>\n            </el-col>\n          </el-row>\n          <el-row  style=\"margin:20px 0px 0px 0px;\">\n            <el-col :span=\"4\"    </el-col>\n            <el-col :span=\"2\" :offset=\"5\">\n              <img :src='defaultImg' style=\"height:18px;\"></img>\n            </el-col>\n            <el-col :span=\"4\">\n        </el-col>\n            <el-col :span=\"4\">\n              <i class=\"el-icon-message\"></i>&nbsp;{{ item.messages }}\n            </el-col>\n            <el-col :span=\"2\" :offset=\"5\">\n </el-col>\n          </el-row>\n          <el-row style=\"margin:5px 0px 0px 0px;height:1px;background-color:black;\"></el-row>\n        </el-row>\n        </el-col>\n        <el-col :span=\"6\" :offset=\"1\">\n          <el-row v-for=\"item in resourcesData\" v-if=\"item.col3\" class=\"hoverChange\" @click.native=\"openDialog(item.id)\">\n          <el-row style=\"margin:20px 0px 0px 0px;\" >\n            <el-col :span=\"8\" :offset=\"1\">\n              <img :src=item.img style=\"height:100px;\"></img>\n            </el-col>\n            <el-col :span=\"14\" :offset=\"1\">\n              <el-row class=\"resourceTitle\">\n                <p>{{ item.name }}</p>\n              </el-row>\n              <el-row class=\"resourceIntro\">\n                <span>{{ item.intro }}</span>\n              </el-row>\n            </el-col>\n          </el-row>\n          <el-row  style=\"margin:20px 0px 0px 0px;\">\n            <el-col :span=\"4\" :offset=\"1\">\n              <i        </el-col>\n            <el-col :span=\"4\">\n              <i class=\"el-icon-message\"></i>&nbsp;{{ item.messages }}\n            </el-col>\n            <el-col :span=\"2\" :offset=\"5\">\n              <img :src='defaultImg' style=\"height:18px;\"></img>\n            </el-col>\n            <el-col :span=\"4\">\n              <a href=\"\">{{ item.author }}</a>\n            </el-col>\n          </el-row>\n          <el-row style=\"margin:10px 0px 0px 0px;\">\n            <el-col :span=\"18\" :offset=\"6\" style=\"color:#d3d3d3;\">\n              上传时间:{{ item.time }}\n            </el-col>\n          </el-row>\n          <el-row style=\"margin:5px 0px 0px 0px;height:1px;background-color:black;\"></el-row>\n        </el-row>\n        </el-col>\n      </el-row>\n      <!-- 分页按钮 -->\n      <el-row>\n        <el-col :span=\"1\" :offset=\"16\" style=\"color:red;height:28px;line-height:28px;\"><label v-if=\"jumpHintVisible\">跳转中</label></el-col>\n        <el-col :span=\"2\">\n          <el-button-group>\n            <el-button type=\"primary\" size=\"small\" @click.native=\"lastPage\"><i class=\"el-icon-arrow-left\"></i></el-button>\n            <el-button type=\"default\" size=\"small\">{{ nowPage }} / {{ pageLength }}</el-button>\n            <el-button type=\"primary\" size=\"small\" @click.native=\"nextPage\"><i class=\"el-icon-arrow-right\"></i></el-button>\n          </el-button-group>\n        </el-col>\n        <el-col :span=\"3\">\n          <label>跳转到</label>\n          <el-input v-model=\"userPage\" style=\"width:50px;\"  size=\"small\" />\n          <el-button type=\"primary\" @click.native=\"jumpPage\" size=\"small\">跳转</el-button>\n        </el-col>\n      </el-row>\n\n    </el-row>\n\n    <!-- 资源详细信息窗口 -->\n    <el-dialog title=\"资源信息\" :visible.sync=\"dialogVisible\" v-if=\"dialogVisible\" size=\"small\">\n      <ResourceDialog></ResourceDialog>\n      <span slot=\"footer\" class=\"dialog-footer\">\n        <el-button @click=\"dialogVisible=false\">取 消</el-button>\n        <el-button type=\"primary\" @click=\"dialogVisible = false\">确 定</el-button>\n      </span>\n    </el-dialog>\n\n    <el-dialog title=\"上传资源\" :visible.sync=\"uploadDialogVisible\" size=\"tiny\">\n      <el-form label-position=\"left\">\n        <el-form-item type=\"text\" label=\"资源介绍\" :label-width=\"form_label_width\">\n          <el-input v-model=\"resourceIntro\" auto_complete=\"off\" placeholder=\"请输入资源介绍\"></el-input>\n        </el-form-item>\n        <el-form-item :label-width=\"form_label_width\">\n          <input type=\"file\" value=\"\" id=\"file\">\n        </el-form-item>     \n      </el-form>  \n      <span slot=\"footer\" class=\"dialog-footer\">\n        <el-button @click=\"uploadDialogVisible=false\">取 消</el-button>\n        <el-button type=\"primary\" @click.native=\"upload\">上 传</el-button>\n      </span>      \n    </el-dialog>\n  </div>\n</template>\n\n\n<script>\n/* eslint-disable camelcase */\nimport Header from '../general/Header'\nimport ResourceDialog from '../general/ResourceDialog'\nimport DefaultImg from './../../assets/fileico/generic.png'\nimport DocImg from './../../assets/fileico/docx_win.png'\nimport PdfImg from './../../assets/fileico/pdf.png'\nimport PptImg from './../../assets/fileico/pptx.png'\nimport JpgImg from './../../assets/fileico/jpeg.png'\nimport ZipImg from './../../assets/fileico/zip.png'\nimport RarImg from './../../assets/fileico/rar.png'\nimport $ from 'jquery'\nimport get_url from '../general/getUrl.js'\nexport default {\n  name: 'resource',\n  components: { Header, ResourceDialog },\n  data () {\n    return {\n      uploadDialogVisible: false,\n      dialogVisible: false,\n      course: '软件工程基础',\n      options: [\n        {\n          value: '选项1',\n          label: '按上传时间排序'\n        }, {\n          value: '选项2',\n          label: '按文件类型排序'\n        }, {\n          value: '选项3',\n          label: '按好评度排序'\n        }\n      ],\n      sortMode: '按上传时间排序',\n      zipImg: ZipImg,\n      pdfImg: PdfImg,\n      pptImg: PptImg,\n      docImg: DocImg,\n      jpgImg: JpgImg,\n      rarImg: RarImg,\n      defaultImg: DefaultImg,\n      resourcesData: [],\n      resourcesIdList: [],\n      fileList: [],\n      resourceIntro: '',\n      nowPage: 1,\n      pageLength: 0,\n      userPage: '',\n      jumpHintVisible: false\n    }\n  },\n  beforeCreate: function () {\n\n  },\n  methods: {\n    closed: function () { alert('还未开放') },\n    return_course_info_page_clicked () {\n      this.$router.push({ path: ('/course/page/' + this.$route.params.course_id + '/') })\n    },\n    openDialog: function (id) {\n      this.$store.state.id = id\n      var resourceDialogSelf = this\n      var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/resource/information/')\n      var _this = this\n      $.ajax({\n        ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\n        dataType: 'json',\n        url: post_url,\n        type: 'POST',\n        async: false,\n        data: {'resource_id': id},\n        success: function (rdata) {\n          resourceDialogSelf.$store.state.name = rdata['resource_info']['name']\n          post_url = get_url(_this.$store.state.dev, '/user/information/')\n          $.ajax({\n            url: post_url,\n            type: 'POST',\n            data: {id: rdata['resource_info']['upload_user_id']},\n            async: false,\n            success: function (data) {\n              data = JSON.parse(data)\n              resourceDialogSelf.$store.state.author = data['user_info']['username']\n            },\n            error: function () {\n              alert('fail')\n            }\n          })\n          // resourceDialogSelf.$store.state.author = rdata['user_info']['username']\n          resourceDialogSelf.$store.state.size = rdata['resource_info']['size']\n          resourceDialogSelf.$store.state.time = rdata['resource_info']['upload_time']\n          resourceDialogSelf.$store.state.intro = rdata['resource_info']['intro']\n          resourceDialogSelf.$store.state.url = rdata['resource_info']['url']\n          resourceDialogSelf.$store.state.download_count = rdata['resource_info']['download_count']\n          resourceDialogSelf.dialogVisible = true\n        },\n        error: function () {\n          alert('fail')\n        }\n      })\n    },\n    upload: function () {\n      var formData = new FormData()\n      var fileObj = document.getElementById('file').files[0]\n      formData.append('file', fileObj)\n      formData.append('name', fileObj.name)\n      formData.append('only_url', false)\n      formData.append('url', null)\n      formData.append('intro', this.resourceIntro)\n      formData.append('course_code', this.$store.state.course_code)\n      var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/resourceUpload/')\n      $.ajax({\n        url: post_url,\n        type: 'POST',\n        data: formData,\n        async: true,\n        cache: false,\n        contentType: false,\n        processData: false,\n        success: function (rdata) {\n          rdata = JSON.parse(rdata)\n          if (rdata['error'] === 0) {\n            alert('上传文件成功！')\n          } else {\n            alert('上传失败！' + rdata['error'])\n          }\n        },\n        error: function () {\n          alert('fail')\n        }\n      })\n    },\n    updateResources: function () {\n      var ss = this\n      var ti = 0\n      let resourceSelf = []\n      var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/resource/information/')\n      var _this = this\n      if (this.pageLength === 0) {\n        ss.jumpHintVisible = false\n        return\n      }\n      for (var i = (ss.nowPage - 1) * 9; i < ss.resourcesIdList.length && i < ss.nowPage * 9; i++) {\n        $.ajax({\n          ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\n          dataType: 'json',\n          url: post_url,\n          type: 'POST',\n          data: {'resource_id': ss.resourcesIdList[i]},\n          success: function (rdata) {\n            var tt = {\n              col1: false,\n              col2: false,\n              col3: false,\n              name: '全部课件.zip',\n              intro: '里面整合了1~13章课件，全部是pdf格式',\n              collections: 0,\n              downloads: 56,\n              messages: 0,\n              author: '果冻',\n              time: '2017-3-26',\n              id: 0,\n              img: ''\n            }\n            if (ti % 3 === 0) {\n              tt.col1 = true\n            }\n            if (ti % 3 === 1) {\n              tt.col2 = true\n            }\n            if (ti % 3 === 2) {\n              tt.col3 = true\n            }\n            ti++\n            tt.name = rdata['resource_info']['name']\n            tt.intro = rdata['resource_info']['intro']\n            tt.downloads = rdata['resource_info']['download_count']\n            post_url = get_url(_this.$store.state.dev, '/user/information/')\n            $.ajax({\n              url: post_url,\n              type: 'POST',\n              data: {id: rdata['resource_info']['upload_user_id']},\n              async: false,\n              success: function (data) {\n                data = JSON.parse(data)\n                tt.author = data['user_info']['username']\n              },\n              error: function () {\n                alert('fail')\n              }\n            })\n            tt.time = rdata['resource_info']['upload_time']\n            tt.id = rdata['resource_info']['id']\n            tt.img = ss.defaultImg\n            var tL = tt.name.length\n            if (tt.name[tL - 3].toLowerCase() === 'd' && tt.name[tL - 2].toLowerCase() === 'o' && tt.name[tL - 1].toLowerCase() === 'c') {\n              tt.img = ss.docImg\n            }\n            if (tt.name[tL - 3].toLowerCase() === 'p' && tt.name[tL - 2].toLowerCase() === 'd' && tt.name[tL - 1].toLowerCase() === 'f') {\n              tt.img = ss.pdfImg\n            }\n            if (tt.name[tL - 3].toLowerCase() === 'p' && tt.name[tL - 2].toLowerCase() === 'p' && tt.name[tL - 1].toLowerCase() === 't') {\n              tt.img = ss.pptImg\n            }\n            if (tt.name[tL - 3].toLowerCase() === 'z' && tt.name[tL - 2].toLowerCase() === 'i' && tt.name[tL - 1].toLowerCase() === 'p') {\n              tt.img = ss.zipImg\n            }\n            if (tt.name[tL - 3].toLowerCase() === 'j' && tt.name[tL - 2].toLowerCase() === 'p' && tt.name[tL - 1].toLowerCase() === 'g') {\n              tt.img = ss.jpgImg\n            }\n            if (tt.name[tL - 3].toLowerCase() === 'r' && tt.name[tL - 2].toLowerCase() === 'a' && tt.name[tL - 1].toLowerCase() === 'r') {\n              tt.img = ss.rarImg\n            }\n            resourceSelf.push(tt)\n            ss.resourcesData = resourceSelf\n            ss.jumpHintVisible = false\n          },\n          error: function () {\n            alert('fail')\n          }\n        })\n      }\n    },\n    lastPage: function () {\n      if (this.nowPage > 1) {\n        this.nowPage--\n        this.jumpHintVisible = true\n        this.updateResources()\n      }\n    },\n    nextPage: function () {\n      if (this.nowPage < this.pageLength) {\n        this.nowPage++\n        this.jumpHintVisible = true\n        this.updateResources()\n      }\n    },\n    jumpPage: function () {\n      var userPageNum = parseInt(this.userPage)\n      if (isNaN(userPageNum)) {\n        alert('请输入合法的页码！')\n      } else if (userPageNum < 1 || userPageNum > this.pageLength) {\n        alert('请输入合法的页码！')\n      } else {\n        this.nowPage = userPageNum\n        this.jumpHintVisible = true\n        this.updateResources()\n      }\n    }\n  },\n  created: function () {\n    var ss = this\n    var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/course/course_info/')\n    $.ajax({\n      ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\n      dataType: 'json',\n      url: post_url,\n      type: 'POST',\n      async: false,\n      data: {'course_id': this.$route.params.course_id},\n      success: function (data) {\n        ss.course = data['course_info']['name']\n        ss.$store.state.course_code = data['course_info']['course_code']\n      },\n      error: function () {\n        alert('fail')\n      }\n    })\n    post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/resource/id/list/')\n    $.ajax({\n      ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\n      dataType: 'json',\n      url: post_url,\n      type: 'POST',\n      async: false,\n      data: {'course_id': this.$route.params.course_id},\n      success: function (data) {\n        ss.resourcesIdList = data['resource_id_list']\n        ss.nowPage = 0\n        ss.pageLength = Math.ceil(ss.resourcesIdList.length / 9)\n        if (ss.pageLength !== 0) {\n          ss.nowPage = 1\n        }\n        ss.updateResources()\n      },\n      error: function () {\n        alert('fail')\n      }\n    })\n  }\n}\n</script>\n\n<style v-model=\"public_rate\" :colors=\"['#99A9BF', '#F7BA2A', '#FF9900']\" show-text disabled text-tamplate=\"{value}\">\n          </el-rate>\n            </el-col>\n          </el-row>\n          <el-row style=\"margin:15px 0px 0px 0px;\">\n            <el-col :span=\"8\">\n              你的评分:\n            </el-col>\n            <el-col :span=\"16\">\n              <el-rate v-model=\"rate\" :colors=\"['#99A9BF', '#F7BA2A', '#FF9900']\" show-text :disabled=\"rate_disable\" @change=\"handle_rate_change\">\n          </el-rate>\n            </el-col>\n          </el-row>\n        </el-col>\n        <el-col :span=\"7\">\n          <el-row style=\"text-align:center;\">\n            <img :src='img' style=\"height:120px;\"></img>\n          </el-row>\n          <el-row style=\"text-align:center;\">\n            <el-button type=\"primary\" @click.native=\"gotoDownload\">点击下载</el-button>\n          </el-row>\n        </el-col>\n      </el-row>\n      <el-row style=\"margin:10px 0px 0px 0px;\">\n        \n      </el-row>\n      <!--\n      <el-row style=\"margin:10px 0px 0px 0px;\">\n        <el-col :span=\"1\" :offset=\"1\"><i    <el-col :span=\"1\" style=\"height:20px;line-height:20px;\">0</el-col>\n        <el-col :span=\"4\" :offset=\"10\" style=\"height:20px;line-height:20px;\"><a href=\"\">我要评论</a></el-col>        \n </el-col>\n      </el-row>\n    -->\n  </div>\n</template>\n\n<script>\n/* eslint-disable camelcase */\nimport DefaultImg from './../../assets/fileico/generic.png'\nimport DocImg from './../../assets/fileico/docx_win.png'\nimport PdfImg from './../../assets/fileico/pdf.png'\nimport PptImg from './../../assets/fileico/pptx.png'\nimport JpgImg from './../../assets/fileico/jpeg.png'\nimport ZipImg from './../../assets/fileico/zip.png'\nimport RarImg from './../../assets/fileico/rar.png'\nimport $ from 'jquery'\nimport get_url from './getUrl.js'\n\nexport default {\n  name: 'ResourceDialog',\n  data () {\n    return {\n      zipImg: ZipImg,\n      pdfImg: PdfImg,\n      pptImg: PptImg,\n      docImg: DocImg,\n      jpgImg: JpgImg,\n      rarImg: RarImg,\n      defaultImg: DefaultImg,\n      img: '',\n      rate: 0,\n      public_rate: '',\n      rate_disable: true,\n      rate_count: ''\n    }\n  },\n  methods: {\n    gotoDownload: function () {\n      var sh = this\n      var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/resource/download_count/')\n      window.open(this.$store.state.url)\n      $.ajax({\n        ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\n        dataType: 'json',\n        url: post_url,\n        type: 'POST',\n        data: { 'download_count': sh.$store.state.id },\n        success: function (data) {\n          sh.$store.state.id = data['download_count']\n        },\n        error: function () {\n          alert('拉取资源列表失败')\n        }\n      })\n    },\n    handle_rate_change: function () {\n      var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/resource/evaluate/')\n      var post_data = { resource_id: this.$store.state.id, grade: this.rate }\n      console.log(this.rate)\n      var _this = this\n      if (this.rate_disable) return\n      if (!this.$store.state.is_login) {\n        this.$message({\n          showClose: true,\n          type: 'error',\n          message: '请先登录再评分'\n        })\n        return\n      }\n      $.ajax({\n        ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\n        dataType: 'json',\n        url: post_url,\n        type: 'POST',\n        data: post_data,\n        success: function (data) {\n          var code = data['error']\n          if (code === 0) {\n            _this.$message({\n              showClose: true,\n              type: 'success',\n              message: '评分成功'\n            })\n          } else {\n            _this.$message({\n              showClose: true,\n              type: 'error',\n              message: '评分失败了呢'\n            })\n          }\n        },\n        error: function () {\n          _this.$message({\n            showClose: true,\n            type: 'error',\n            message: '无法连接到服务器'\n          })\n        }\n      })\n    }\n  },\n  created: function () {\n    this.img = this.defaultImg\n    let tL = this.$store.state.name.length\n    if (this.$store.state.name[tL - 3].toLowerCase() === 'd' && this.$store.state.name[tL - 2].toLowerCase() === 'o' && this.$store.state.name[tL - 1].toLowerCase() === 'c') {\n      this.img = this.docImg\n    }\n    if (this.$store.state.name[tL - 3].toLowerCase() === 'p' && this.$store.state.name[tL - 2].toLowerCase() === 'p' && this.$store.state.name[tL - 1].toLowerCase() === 't') {\n      this.img = this.pptImg\n    }\n    if (this.$store.state.name[tL - 3].toLowerCase() === 'p' && this.$store.state.name[tL - 2].toLowerCase() === 'd' && this.$store.state.name[tL - 1].toLowerCase() === 'f') {\n      this.img = this.pdfImg\n    }\n    if (this.$store.state.name[tL - 3].toLowerCase() === 'z' && this.$store.state.name[tL - 2].toLowerCase() === 'i' && this.$store.state.name[tL - 1].toLowerCase() === 'p') {\n      this.img = this.zipImg\n    }\n    if (this.$store.state.name[tL - 3].toLowerCase() === 'r' && this.$store.state.name[tL - 2].toLowerCase() === 'a' && this.$store.state.name[tL - 1].toLowerCase() === 'r') {\n      this.img = this.rarImg\n    }\n    if (this.$store.state.name[tL - 3].toLowerCase() === 'j' && this.$store.state.name[tL - 2].toLowerCase() === 'p' && this.$store.state.name[tL - 1].toLowerCase() === 'g') {\n      this.img = this.jpgImg\n    }\n  },\n  beforeCreate: function () {\n    var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/resource/evaluation/grade/count/')\n    var post_data = { resource_id: this.$store.state.id }\n    var _this = this\n    $.ajax({\n      ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\n      dataType: 'json',\n      url: post_url,\n      type: 'POST',\n      data: post_data,\n      success: function (data) {\n        var avg = data['avg_grade']\n        var personal_grade = data['user_grade']\n        _this.rate_count = data['grade_count']\n        if (avg === -1) _this.public_rate = 0\n        else _this.public_rate = String(avg).substr(0, 3)\n        if (personal_grade === -1) {\n          _this.rate_disable = false\n        } else {\n          _this.rate = personal_grade\n        }\n      },\n      error: function () {\n        _this.$message({\n          showClose: true,\n          type: 'error',\n          message: '无法连接到服务器'\n        })\n      }\n    })\n  }\n}\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n  .text{\n    word-break: break-all;\n    word-wrap: break-word;\n    white-space: pre-wrap;\n <el-input type=\"password\" v-model=\"register_form.confirmed_password\" auto_complete=\"off\" placeholder=\"确认密码\"></el-input>\n      </el-form-item>\n      <el-form-item type=\"text\" label=\"北航邮箱\" :label-width=\"form_label_width\" prop=\"email\" id=\"register_form6\">\n        <el-input v-model=\"register_form.email\" auto_complete=\"off\" placeholder=\"合法的北航邮箱\"></el-input>\n      </el-form-item>\n    </el-form>\n      <span slot=\"footer\" class=\"dialog-footer\">\n        <el-button @click.native=\"tongpao\" type=\"success\" round>使用“同袍”认证免注册登录</el-button>\n        <el-button </el-dialog>\n</div>\n</template>\n\n<script>\n/* eslint-disable brace-style */\n/* eslint-disable camelcase */\nimport $ from 'jquery'\n// 请不要删除和geturl相关的行，直接把data中的dev更改成false就可以。by xindetai 12/3\nimport get_url from './getUrl.js'\n// import json from 'json5'\nexport default {\n  name: 'Header',\n  beforeCreate: function () {\n    var self = this\n    var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/sign/logged_in/')\n    $.ajax({\n      ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\n      dataType: 'json',\n      url: post_url,\n      type: 'POST',\n      success: function (data) {\n        self.username = data['username']\n        if (self.username == null) {\n          self.is_login = false\n          self.$store.state.is_login = false\n          self.$store.state.user_name = ''\n        } else {\n          self.is_login = true\n          self.$store.state.is_login = true\n          self.$store.state.user_name = self.username\n        }\n      },\n      error: function () {\n        alert('加载导航栏连接服务器失败')\n      }\n    })\n    post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/sign/iprecord/')\n    $.ajax({\n      ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\n      dataType: 'json',\n      url: post_url,\n      type: 'POST',\n      success: function (data) {\n      },\n      error: function () {\n        alert('ip记录链接失败')\n      }\n    })\n  },\n  data () {\n    var username_check_empty = (rule, value, callback) => {\n      if (!value) {\n        callback(new Error('用户名不能为空'))\n      }\n      callback()\n      // setTimeout(() => {  }, 500)\n    }\n    var password_check_empty = (rule, value, callback) => {\n      if (!value) {\n        callback(new Error('密码不能为空'))\n      }\n      callback()\n      // setTimeout(() => { callback() }, 500)\n    }\n    var check_username = (rule, value, callback) => {\n      if (!value) {\n        callback(new Error('用户名不能为空'))\n      }\n      setTimeout(() => {\n        value = value.toLowerCase()\n        var pattern = new RegExp(/^[a-z0-9_]{1,20}$/)\n        if (pattern.test(value)) {\n          callback()\n        }\n        else {\n          callback(new Error('用户名格式错误'))\n        }\n      }, 500)\n    }\n    var check_nickname = (rule, value, callback) => {\n      if (!value) {\n        callback(new Error('昵称不能为空'))\n      }\n      setTimeout(() => {\n        var l = value.length\n        var rl = 0\n        for (var i = 0; i < l; i++) {\n          if ((value.charCodeAt(i) & 0xff00) !== 0) {\n            rl++\n          }\n          rl++\n        }\n        if (rl >= 1 && rl <= 20) {\n          callback()\n        }\n        else {\n          callback(new Error('昵称长度必须在20位及以下'))\n        }\n      }, 500)\n    }\n    var check_gender = (rule, value, callback) => {\n      if (!value) {\n        callback(new Error('性别不能为空'))\n      }\n      callback()\n    }\n    var check_password = (rule, value, callback) => {\n      if (!value) {\n        callback(new Error('密码不能为空'))\n      }\n      setTimeout(() => {\n        var pattern = new RegExp(/^.{8,20}$/)\n        if (pattern.test(value)) {\n          callback()\n        }\n        else {\n          callback(new Error('密码长度必须在8-20位'))\n        }\n      }, 500)\n    }\n    var check_confirmed_password = (rule, value, callback) => {\n      if (!value) {\n        callback(new Error('请再次输入密码'))\n      }\n      setTimeout(() => {\n        if (value === this.register_form.password) {\n          callback()\n        }\n        else {\n          callback(new Error('两次输入密码不一致'))\n        }\n      }, 500)\n    }\n    var check_email = (rule, value, callback) => {\n      if (!value) {\n        callback(new Error('邮箱不能为空'))\n      }\n      setTimeout(() => {\n        var pattern = new RegExp(/^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+@buaa.edu.cn$/)\n        if (pattern.test(value)) {\n          callback()\n        }\n        else {\n          callback(new Error('非法邮箱，邮箱必须是北航邮箱'))\n        }\n      }, 500)\n    }\n    return {\n      logo_name: 'BUAA-iCourse',\n      is_login: false,\n      login_form_visible: false,\n      register_form_visible: false,\n      form_label_width: '80px',\n      username: '',\n      dev: true,\n      login_form: {\n        username: '',\n        password: ''\n      },\n      register_form: {\n        username: '',\n        nickname: '',\n        gender: '',\n        password: '',\n        confirmed_password: '',\n        email: ''\n      },\n      gender_options: [{\n        value: '1',\n        label: '男'\n      }, {\n        value: '2',\n        label: '女'\n      }, {\n        value: '0',\n        label: '保密'\n      }],\n      login_rules: {\n        username: [\n          { validator: username_check_empty, trigger: 'blur' }\n        ],\n        password: [\n          { validator: password_check_empty, trigger: 'blur' }\n        ]\n      },\n      register_rules: {\n        username: [\n          { validator: check_username, trigger: 'blur' }\n        ],\n        nickname: [\n          { validator: check_nickname, trigger: 'blur' }\n        ],\n        gender: [\n          { validator: check_gender, trigger: 'blur' }\n        ],\n        password: [\n          { validator: check_password, trigger: 'blur' }\n        ],\n        confirmed_password: [\n          { validator: check_confirmed_password, trigger: 'blur' }\n        ],\n        email: [\n          { validator: check_email, trigger: 'blur' }\n        ]\n      }\n    }\n  },\n  methods: {\n    tongpao: function () {\n      var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/login_tongpao/')\n      $.ajax({\n        ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\n        dataType: 'json',\n        url: post_url,\n        type: 'POST',\n        success: function (data) {\n          window.location.href = data['url']\n          window.open()\n        },\n        error: function () {\n          alert('无法连接到同袍')\n        }\n      })\n    },\n    handle_select: function (key, keyPath) {\n      if (key === 'index') {\n        this.$router.push({ path: '/index' })\n      }\n      else if (key === 'course') {\n        this.$router.push({ path: '/course' })\n      }\n    },\n    login: function () { this.login_form_visible = true },\n    personal_space: function () { this.$router.push({ path: ('/user/home/' + this.username) }) },\n    register: function () { this.register_form_visible = true },\n    logo_clicked: function () { this.$router.push({ path: ('/index') }) },\n    logout: function () {\n      var self = this\n      $.ajax({\n        ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\n        dataType: 'json',\n        url: '/sign/logout/',\n        type: 'POST',\n        success: function (data) {\n          switch (data['error']) {\n            case 0:\n              self.is_login = false\n              self.username = null\n              alert('登出成功')\n              self.$store.state.is_login = false\n              self.$store.state.user_name = ''\n              break\n            case 301:\n              alert('登出失败')\n              break\n            default:\n              alert('未知错误')\n          }\n        },\n        error: function () {\n          alert('登出连接服务器失败')\n        }\n      })\n    },\n    login_confirm_clicked: function (form_name) { this.$refs[form_name].validate((valid) => {\n      if (valid) {\n        var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/sign/login/')\n        var post_data = {\n          'username': this.login_form['username'],\n          'password': this.login_form['password']\n        }\n        var self = this\n        $.ajax({\n          ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\n          dataType: 'json',\n          url: post_url,\n          type: 'POST',\n          data: post_data,\n          success: function (data) {\n            // data = JSON.parse(data)\n            // login_form_visible = false\n            switch (data['error']) {\n              case 0:\n                self.login_form_visible = false\n                // self.username = post_data['username']\n                self.username = data['username']\n                self.is_login = true\n                self.$store.state.user_name = self.username\n                self.$store.state.is_login = true\n                alert('登录成功')\n                break\n              case 101:\n                alert('登录失败：用户名不存在或密码不匹配')\n                break\n              case 102:\n                alert('登录失败：非法的输入')\n                break\n              default:\n                alert('未知错误')\n            }\n          },\n          error: function () {\n            alert('服务器连接异常')\n          }\n        })\n      } else {\n        return false\n      }\n    })\n    },\n    handle_close_login (done) {\n      this.login_form_visible = false\n    },\n    handle_close_register (done) {\n      this.register_form_visible = false\n    },\n    register_confirm_clicked: function (form_name) { this.$refs[form_name].validate((valid) => {\n      if (valid) {\n        var post_data = {\n @click=\"check_all_resource_clicked\" style=\"float: right;\">\n                查看全部\n              </el-button>\n            </el-col> \n            <el-col :span=\"2\" :offset=\"1\">\n </el-row>\n        <el-row class = \"resource_container\" >\n          <el-col :span=\"16\" class=\"hot_resource_container\">\n              <p style=\"text-align: left;padding-bottom: 20px;font-size:      </p>\n                      </el-row>\n                      </el-col>\n                    </el-row>\n                </el-button>\n              </el-tooltip>\n              <hr style=\"border: none;border-top: 1px solid rgb(241,242,244)\"/>\n                </el-col>\n\n      </el-row>\n    </template>\n    </div>\n  <el-dialog title=\"上传资源\" :visible.sync=\"uploadDialogVisible\" size=\"tiny\">\n      <el-form label-position=\"left\">\n        <el-form-item type=\"text\" label=\"资源介绍\" :label-width=\"form_label_width\">\n          <el-input v-model=\"resourceIntro\" auto_complete=\"off\" placeholder=\"请输入资源介绍\"></el-input>\n        </el-form-item>\n        <el-form-item :label-width=\"form_label_width\">\n          <input type=\"file\" value=\"\" id=\"file\">\n        </el-form-item>     \n      </el-form>  \n      <span slot=\"footer\" class=\"dialog-footer\">\n        <el-button @click=\"uploadDialogVisible=false\">取 消</el-button>\n        <el-button type=\"primary\" @click.native=\"upload\">上 传</el-button>\n      </span>      \n    </el-dialog>\n\n  <!-- 资源具体信息dialog -->\n  <el-dialog title=\"资源信息\" :visible.sync=\"dialogVisible\" v-if=\"dialogVisible\" size=\"small\">\n      <ResourceDialog></ResourceDialog>\n      <span slot=\"footer\" class=\"dialog-footer\">\n        <el-button @click=\"dialogVisible=false\">取 消</el-button>\n        <el-button type=\"primary\" @click=\"dialogVisible = false\">确 定</el-button>\n      </span>\n  </el-dialog>\n  </div>\n\n</template>\n\n<script type=\"text/javascript\">\n/* eslint-disable camelcase */\n/* eslint-disable space-infix-ops */\nimport Header from '../general/Header.vue'\nimport DocImg from './../../assets/fileico/docx_win.png'\nimport PdfImg from './../../assets/fileico/pdf.png'\nimport PptImg from './../../assets/fileico/pptx.png'\nimport JpgImg from './../../assets/fileico/jpeg.png'\nimport ZipImg from './../../assets/fileico/zip.png'\nimport RarImg from './../../assets/fileico/rar.png'\nimport ResourceDialog from '../general/ResourceDialog.vue'\nimport $ from 'jquery'\n// 请不要删除和get_url相关的行，如果你真的需要请告诉我下原因。by xindetai\nimport get_url from '../general/getUrl.js'\nimport college_map from '../general/collegeMap.js'\n\nexport default {\n  name: 'course_info',\n  components: { Header, ResourceDialog },\n  beforeCreate () {\n    var self = this\n    var course_id = this.$route.params.course_id\n    var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/course/course_info/')\n    var postData = { 'course_id': course_id }\n    $.ajax({\n      ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\n      dataType: 'json',\n      url: post_url,\n      type: 'POST',\n      data: postData,\n      success: function (data) {\n        var info = data['course_info']\n        var college_id = info['college_id']\n        var college_info = (college_map.hasOwnProperty(college_id)) ? college_map[college_id] : college_id.toString()\n        self.course_name = info['name']\n        self.teacher = undefined\n        self.academy = college_info\n        self.hours = info['hours']\n        self.intro_info = undefined\n        self.$store.state.course_code = info['course_code']\n      },\n      error: function () {\n        alert('fail')\n      }\n    })\n    post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/course/visit_count/')\n    $.ajax({\n      ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\n      dataType: 'json',\n      url: post_url,\n      type: 'POST',\n      data: postData,\n      success: function (data) {\n        self.visit_count = data['visit_count']\n      },\n      error: function () {\n        alert('点击次数链接异常')\n      }\n    })\n    post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/course/like/count/')\n    $.ajax({\n      ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\n      dataType: 'json',\n      url: post_url,\n      type: 'POST',\n      data: postData,\n      success: function (data) {\n        self.liked = data['liked']\n        self.like_count = data['like_count']\n      },\n      error: function () {\n        alert('收藏量获取异常')\n      }\n    })\n    /*\n    // loading the contribution_list\n    $.ajax({\n      ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\n      dataType: 'json',\n      url: get_url('')\n    })\n    */\n    // loading the resource\n  },\n  data () {\n    return {\n      course_id: this.$route.params.course_id,\n      like_count: 0,\n      liked: false,\n      course_name: '',\n      teacher: '',\n      academy: '',\n      hours: '',\n      intro_info: '',\n      visit_count: -1,\n      contribution_data: [],\n      uploadDialogVisible: false,\n      fileList: [],\n      total_resource_line: 3,\n      form_label_width: '80px',\n      dialogVisible: false,\n      resourceIntro: '',\n      card_data: [\n        [{ title: '', uploader: '', frequency: '', show: 'hidden', id: '', img: '' },\n         { title: '', uploader: '', frequency: '', show: 'hidden', id: '', img: '' },\n         { title: '', uploader: '', frequency: '', show: 'hidden', id: '', img: '' }],\n        [{ title: '', uploader: '', frequency: '', show: 'hidden', id: '', img: '' },\n         { title: '', uploader: '', frequency: '', show: 'hidden', id: '', img: '' },\n         { title: '', uploader: '', frequency: '', show: 'hidden', id: '', img: '' }],\n        [{ title: '', uploader: '', frequency: '', show: 'hidden', id: '', img: '' },\n         { title: '', uploader: '', frequency: '', show: 'hidden', id: '', img: '' },\n         { title: '', uploader: '', frequency: '', show: 'hidden', id: '', img: '' }]\n      ],\n      img: { zip: ZipImg,\n        pdf: PdfImg,\n        ppt: PptImg,\n        pptx: PptImg,\n        doc: DocImg,\n        docx: DocImg,\n        jpg: JpgImg,\n        rar: RarImg\n      }\n    }\n  },\n  methods: {\n    course_like: function () {\n      var post_url = ''\n      var post_data = { course_id: this.course_id }\n      var _this = this\n      if (!this.$store.state.is_login) {\n        this.$message({\n          showClose: true,\n          type: 'error',\n          message: '请先登录再收藏'\n        })\n        return\n      }\n      if (this.liked) {\n        post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/course/like/cancel/')\n      } else {\n        post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/course/like/add/')\n      }\n      $.ajax({\n        ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\n        dataType: 'json',\n        url: post_url,\n        type: 'POST',\n        data: post_data,\n        success: function (data) {\n          if (_this.liked) {\n            _this.$message({\n              showClose: true,\n              type: 'success',\n              message: '取消成功'\n            })\n            _this.liked = false\n            _this.like_count -= 1\n          } else {\n            _this.$message({\n              showClose: true,\n              type: 'success',\n              message: '收藏成功'\n            })\n            _this.liked = true\n            _this.like_count += 1\n          }\n        },\n        error: function () {\n          alert('收藏异常')\n        }\n      })\n    },\n    course_cancel_like: function () {\n\n    },\n    return_course_page_clicked: function () {\n      this.$router.push({ path: '/course/' })\n    },\n    upload: function () {\n      var formData = new FormData()\n      var fileObj = document.getElementById('file').files[0]\n      formData.append('file', fileObj)\n      formData.append('name', fileObj.name)\n      formData.append('only_url', false)\n      formData.append('url', null)\n      formData.append('intro', this.resourceIntro)\n      formData.append('course_code', this.$store.state.course_code)\n      var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/resourceUpload/')\n      $.ajax({\n        url: post_url,\n        type: 'POST',\n        data: formData,\n        async: true,\n        cache: false,\n        contentType: false,\n        processData: false,\n        success: function (rdata) {\n          rdata = JSON.parse(rdata)\n          if (rdata['error'] === 0) {\n            alert('上传文件成功！')\n          } else {\n            alert('上传失败！' + rdata['error'])\n          }\n        },\n        error: function () {\n          alert('fail')\n        }\n      })\n    },\n    edit_course: function () {\n      this.$message({\n        showClose: true,\n        message: '功能暂未开放，敬请期待'\n      })\n    },\n    submitUpload () {\n      this.$refs.upload.submit()\n    },\n    handleRemove (file, fileList) {\n      console.log(file, fileList)\n    },\n    handlePreview (file) {\n      console.log(file)\n    },\n    check_all_resource_clicked: function () {\n      this.$router.push({ path: 'resource/' })\n    },\n    enter_forum_clicked: function () {\n      this.$router.push({ path: 'forum/' })\n    },\n    card_clicked (i, j) {\n      this.$store.state.id = this.card_data[i][j].id\n      var resourceDialogSelf = this\n      var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/resource/information/')\n      var _this = this\n      $.ajax({\n        ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\n        dataType: 'json',\n        url: post_url,\n        type: 'POST',\n        async: false,\n        data: {'resource_id': resourceDialogSelf.card_data[i][j].id},\n        success: function (rdata) {\n          resourceDialogSelf.$store.state.name = rdata['resource_info']['name']\n          post_url = get_url(_this.$store.state.dev, '/user/information/')\n          $.ajax({\n            url: post_url,\n            type: 'POST',\n            data: {id: rdata['resource_info']['upload_user_id']},\n            async: false,\n            success: function (data) {\n              data = JSON.parse(data)\n              resourceDialogSelf.$store.state.author = data['user_info']['username']\n            },\n            error: function () {\n              alert('fail')\n            }\n          })\n          // resourceDialogSelf.$store.state.author = rdata['resource_info']['upload_user_id']\n          resourceDialogSelf.$store.state.size = rdata['resource_info']['size']\n          resourceDialogSelf.$store.state.time = rdata['resource_info']['upload_time']\n          resourceDialogSelf.$store.state.intro = rdata['resource_info']['intro']\n          resourceDialogSelf.$store.state.url = rdata['resource_info']['url']\n          resourceDialogSelf.dialogVisible = true\n        },\n        error: function () {\n          alert('拉取资源信息失败')\n        }\n      })\n    }\n  },\n  mounted () {\n    var course_id = this.$route.params.course_id\n\n    // latest resource\n    var post_data = { 'course_id': course_id, 'number': this.total_resource_line }\n    var self = this\n    var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/resource/latest/')\n    $.ajax({\n      ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\n      dataType: 'json',\n      url: post_url,\n      type: 'POST',\n      data: post_data,\n      success: function (data) {\n        var pos = 2 // pos of latest resource\n        var info = data['result']\n        for (var i = 0; i < info.length; i++) {\n          self.card_data[i][pos].title=info[i]['name']\n          self.card_data[i][pos].uploader=info[i]['username']\n          self.card_data[i][pos].frequency=info[i]['download_count']\n          self.card_data[i][pos].id = info[i]['resource_id']\n          self.card_data[i][pos].show = 'visible'\n          var name = info[i]['name'].toLowerCase()\n          for (var t in self.img) {\n            var temp = '.'+t+'$'\n            var reg = new RegExp(temp)\n            if (reg.test(name)) {\n              self.card_data[i][pos].img = self.img[t]\n              break\n            }\n          }\n        }\n      },\n      error: function () {\n        alert('拉取最新资源列表失败')\n      }\n    })\n    // hot resource\n    post_data = { 'course_id': course_id, 'number': this.total_resource_line*2 }\n    post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/course/resource/download/most/info/')\n    $.ajax({\n      ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\n      dataType: 'json',\n      url: post_url,\n      type: 'POST',\n      data: post_data,\n      success: function (data) {\n        var info = data['info_list']\n        for (var i = 0; i < info.length; i++) {\n          var col = Math.floor(i % 2)\n          var row = Math.floor(i / 2)\n          self.card_data[row][col].title=info[i]['name']\n          self.card_data[row][col].uploader=info[i]['username']\n          self.card_data[row][col].frequency=info[i]['download_count']\n          self.card_data[row][col].id = info[i]['resource_id']\n          self.card_data[row][col].show = 'visible'\n          var name = info[i]['name'].toLowerCase()\n          for (var t in self.img) {\n            var temp = '.'+t+'$'\n            var reg = new RegExp(temp)\n            if (reg.test(name)) {\n              self.card_data[row][col].img = self.img[t]\n              break\n            }\n          }\n        }\n      },\n      error: function () {\n        alert('拉取热门资源列表失败')\n      }\n    })\n    // course contribution\n    var post_url1 = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/course/contri/')\n    var post_data1 = { course_id: this.$route.params.course_id }\n    $.ajax({\n      ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\n      dataType: 'json',\n      url: post_url1,\n      type: 'POST',\n      data: post_data1,\n      success: function (data) {\n        var contri_list = data['contri_list']\n        if (contri_list) {\n          for (var i = 0; i < contri_list.length; i++) {\n            var temp = {}\n            temp.contribution_score = contri_list[i].contri\n            temp.contribution_username = contri_list[i].username\n            self.contribution_data.push(temp)\n          }\n        }\n      },\n      error: function () {\n        self.$message({\n          showClose: true,\n          type: 'error',\n          message: '无法连接到服务器'\n        })\n      }\n    })\n    /*\n    var post_url2 = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/resource/hot/')\n    var post_data2 = { course_id: this.$route.params.course_id, number: 6 }\n    $.ajax({\n      ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\n      dataType: 'json',\n      url: post_url2,\n      type: }\n}\n</script>\n\n\n<style type=\"text/css\" scoped>\n  .course_introduction{\n    margin-top: 10px;\n    padding-left: 20px;\n    height: 100%;\n    width: 100%;\n  }\n  .contribution_container{\n    position:absolute;\n    left:75%;\n    margin-left: 10px;\n  }\n  .contribution_table{\n    margin-bottom: 50px;\n  }\n  .item{\n    padding-bottom: 5px;\n  }\n  .course_resource_container{\n    position:absolute;\n    top:400px;\n    margin-top: 40px;\n    padding-left: 20px;\n    width: 71%;\n  }\n  .resource_container{\n    width:auto;\n  }\n  .hot_resource_container{\n    width:auto;\n  }\n  .latest_resource_container{\n    width: auto;\n  }\n  .card_title_text:hover{\n    color: #58B7FF;\n  }\n  .card_button{\n    padding-top:0px;\n    margin-top:0px;\n    border:0px;\n black;\n  }\n  .card_text{\n    color: grey;\n  }\n</style>\n\n\n// WEBPACK FOOTER //\n// src/components/course/Course_info.vue","<template>\n  <div id='forum' class='container'>\n    <Header></Header>\n    <el-row>\n      <el-col :span=\"24\">\n        <el-button type=\"primary\" icon=\"d-arrow-left\" style=\"margin:20px 0px 0px 20px\" }}-讨论版\n        </p>\n      </el-col>\n    </el-row>\n    <el-row>\n      <el-col :span=\"9\" :offset=\"3\">\n        <el-radio-group v-model=\"selected_filter\" @change=\"handle_filter_change\">\n          <template v-for=\"term in search_terms\">\n            <el-radio-button class=\"button_group_static\" :label=\"term.text\">\n              {{ term.text }}\n            </el-radio-button>\n          </template>\n        </el-radio-group>\n      </el-col>\n      <el-col :span=\"3\" :offset=\"3\">\n        <el-button type=\"primary\" @click=\"post_button_clicked\" icon=\"plus\" style=\"width:150px;\">\n          发表新帖子\n        </el-button>\n      </el-col>\n      <el-col :span=\"4\" :offset=\"0\">\n        <el-input type=\"text\" v-model = \"search_text\" placeholder=\"在当前条目下搜索\" @keydown.enter.native.prevent=\"search_button_clicked\" icon=\"search\" :on-icon-click=\"search_button_clicked\"></el-input>\n      </el-col>\n    </el-row>\n    <template v-for=\"thread in current_threads\">\n      <el-row type=\"flex\" justify=\"center\" class=\"thread_container\">\n        <el-col :span=\"4\">\n          <el-row>\n            <el-col :span=\"8\">\n              <p class=\"thread_info_num\" style=\"color:#58B7FF\">{{ thread.agree_num }}</p>\n            </el-col>\n            <el-col :span=\"8\">\n              <p class=\"thread_info_num\" style=\"color:rgb(80,80,80)\">{{ thread.follow_num }}</p>\n            </el-col>\n            <el-col :span=\"8\">\n              <p class=\"thread_info_num\" style=\"color:grey\">{{ thread.read_num }}</p>\n            </el-col>\n          </el-row>\n          <el-row>\n            <el-col :span=\"8\">\n              <p class=\"thread_info_term\" style=\"color:#58B7FF\">赞同</p>\n class=\"thread_info_term\" style=\"color:grey\">浏览</p>\n            </el-col>\n          </el-row>\n        </el-col>\n        <el-col :span=\"14\" :offset=\"1\">\n          <el-row style=\"padding-bottom: 10px;\">\n            <el-button type=\"text\" class=\"title_button\" @click=\"enter_thread_button_clicked(thread.id)\">\n            <p style=\"\">\n              <span style=\"\">{{ thread.type }} ·</span>\n              <span style=\"\">{{ thread.title }}</span>\n            </p>\n          </el-button>\n          </el-row>\n          <el-row style=\"padding-bottom: 10px;\">\n            <p class=\"thread_description\"> {{ thread.description }} </p>\n          </el-row>\n          <el-row>\n            <p style=\"float: right;color:grey\"> {{ thread.user_name }} 最后编辑于 {{ thread.time }}</p>\n          </el-row>\n        </el-col>\n      </el-row>\n      <center><hr width=\"80%\"/></center>\n    </template>\n    <el-row type=\"flex\" justify=\"center\">\n      <el-col :span=\"18\">\n      <center><el-pagination layout=\"prev,pager,next\" @current-change=\"handle_current_change\" :page-size=\"page_size\" :total=\"total_threads\" :current-page.sync=\"current_page\" style=\"margin-top: 40px\"></el-pagination>\n      </center>\n    </el-col>\n    </el-row>\n  </div>\n</template>\n\n<script type=\"text/javascript\">\n/* eslint-disable brace-style */\n/* eslint-disable camelcase */\n/* eslint-disable space-infix-ops */\nimport Header from '../general/Header'\nimport get_url from '../general/getUrl.js'\nimport $ from 'jquery'\nexport default {\n  name: 'Forum',\n  components: { Header },\n  beforeCreate () {\n    this.page_size = 10\n    var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/post/id/list/')\n    var post_data = { course_id: this.$route.params.course_id }\n    var _this = this\n    $.ajax({\n      ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\n      dataType: 'json',\n      url: post_url,\n      type: 'POST',\n      data: post_data,\n      success: function (data) {\n        var id_list = data['id_list']\n        if (id_list.length !== 0) {\n          _this.total_threads = id_list.length\n          var len = (id_list.length > _this.page_size ? _this.page_size : id_list.length)\n          var target_list = id_list.slice(0, len)\n          for (var j = 0; j < id_list.length; j++) {\n            _this.threads.push(id_list[j])\n          }\n          post_data = { id_list: JSON.stringify(target_list), get_content: true, get_grade: true, get_follow_count: true }\n          post_url = get_url(_this.$store.state.dev, '/post/information/list/')\n          $.ajax({\n            ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\n            dataType: 'json',\n            url: post_url,\n            type: 'POST',\n            data: post_data,\n            success: function (data) {\n              var info_list = data['info_list']\n              for (var i = 0; i < info_list.length; i++) {\n                var type = (info_list[i].type === 1 ? '问题讨论' : (info_list[i].type === 2 ? '学习心得' : '其他'))\n              // need to cut description\n                var cut_description = (info_list[i].intro.length < 100 ? info_list[i].intro : info_list[i].intro.substr(0, 100)) + '....'\n                var thread = { id: id_list[i], agree_num: info_list[i].grade_sum, follow_num: info_list[i].follow_count, read_num: info_list[i].click_count, type: type, title: info_list[i].title, description: cut_description, user_name: info_list[i].username, time: info_list[i].update_time }\n                _this.current_threads.push(thread)\n              }\n            },\n            error: function () {\n              _this.$message({\n                showClose: true,\n                type: 'error',\n                message: '加载帖子信息失败'\n              })\n            }\n          })\n        }\n      },\n      error: function () {\n        _this.$message({\n          showClose: true,\n          type: 'error',\n          message: '加载帖子列表失败'\n        })\n      }\n    })\n    post_data = { 'course_id': this.$route.params.course_id }\n    post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/course/course_info/')\n    $.ajax({\n      ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\n      dataType: 'json',\n      url: post_url,\n      type: 'POST',\n      data: post_data,\n      success: function (data) {\n        var info = data['course_info']\n        _this.course_name = info.name\n      },\n      error: function () {\n        _this.$message({\n          showClose: true,\n          type: 'error',\n          message: '获取课程信息失败'\n        })\n      }\n    })\n  },\n  data () {\n    return {\n      course_name: '',\n      total_threads: 0,\n      page_size: 10,\n      current_page: 1,\n      selected_filter: '全部',\n      search_text: '',\n      current_threads: [],\n      threads: [],\n      search_terms: [\n        { text: '全部' },\n        { text: '学习心得' },\n        { text: '问题讨论' },\n        { text: '其他' }\n      ],\n      thread_terms: [ '赞同', '跟帖', '浏览' ]\n\n    }\n  },\n  methods: {\n    return_course_button_clicked: function () {\n      this.$router.push({ path: '/course/page/'+this.$route.params.course_id+'/' })\n    },\n    search_button_clicked: function () {\n      this.$message({\n        showClose: true,\n        message: '尚未开放，敬请期待'\n      })\n    },\n    handle_current_change: function (value) {\n      this.current_page = value\n      this.current_threads = []\n      var len = this.threads.length < value*this.page_size ? this.threads.length % this.page_size : this.page_size\n      var target_list = []\n      for (var j = 0; j < len; j++) {\n        target_list.push(this.threads[(value-1)*this.page_size+j])\n      }\n      var post_data = { id_list: target_list, get_content: true, get_grade: true, get_follow_count: true }\n      var post_url = get_url(this.$store.state.dev, '/post/information/list/')\n      var _this = this\n      $.ajax({\n        ContentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',\n        dataType: 'json',\n        url: post_url,\n        type: 'POST',\n        data: post_data,\n        success: function (data) {\n          var info_list = data['info_list']\n          for (var i = 0; i < info_list.length; i++) {\n            var type = (info_list[i].type === 1 ? '问题讨论' : (info_list[i].type === 2 ? '学习心得' : '其他'))\n              // need to cut description\n            var cut_description = (info_list[i].intro.length < 100 ? info_list[i].intro : info_list[i].intro.substr(0, 100)) + '....'\n            var thread = { id: target_list[i], agree_num: info_list[i].grade_sum, follow_num: info_list[i].follow_count, read_num: info_list[i].read_count, type: type, title: info_list[i].title, description: cut_description, user_name: info_list[i].username, time: info_list[i].update_time }\n            _this.current_threads.push(thread)\n          }\n        },\n        error: function () {\n          _this.$message({\n            showClose: true,\n            type: 'error',\n            message: '加载帖子信息失败'\n          })\n        }\n      })\n    },\n    handle_filter_change: function (value) {\n      // handle the filter changing of thread\n    },\n    enter_thread_button_clicked: function (value) {\n      this.$router.push({ path: '/forum/'+value+'/' })\n    },\n    post_button_clicked: function () {\n      if (this.$store.state.is_login === true) {\n        this.$router.push({path: '/course/page/' + this.$route.params.course_id + '/forum/new'})\n      }\n      else {\n        this.$message({\n          message: '请先登录再发帖',\n          showClose: true,\n          type: 'warning'\n        })\n      }\n    }\n  }\n}\n</script>\n\n<style type=\"text/css\" scoped>\n  .container{\n    font-family: Microsoft Yahei;\n  }\n  .title{\n    text-align: center;\n    font-size: 40px;\n    padding-bottom: 30px;\n  }\n  .button_group_static{\n    text-align: center;\n  }\n  .thread_info_num{\n    text-align: center;\n    font-size: 24px;\n    padding-bottom: 10px;\n    padding-top: 0px;\n    margin-top: 0px;\n  }\n  .thread_info_term{\n    text-align: center;\n    font-size: 24px;\n  }\n  .title_button{\n    padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px;\n    margin: 4px 0px 0px 4px;\n    color:black;\n    font-size: 24px;\n    word-wrap: break-word;\n    word-break:break-all;\n    white-space: pre-wrap;\n  }\n  .title_button:hover{\n    color: #58B7FF;\n    text-decoration: underline;\n  }\n  .thread_container{\n    margin-top: 30px;\n    height: auto;\n  }\n  .thread_description{\n    color: grey;\n    white-space: pre-wrap;\n    word-break: break-all;\n    word-wrap:break-word;\n  }\n</style>\n\n\n// WEBPACK FOOTER //\n// \"arrow_button\" @click=\"agree_button_clicked(true,1,main.id,-1)\"></el-button>\n        </center>\n        </el-row>\n        <el-row>\n          <center>\n            <p class=\"agree_num\">{{
